Synopsis:
The star of the race cars, "Lightning" McQueen, and the unique crane Mate, take their friendship to exciting destinations in CARS 2, when they cross the ocean to attend the first "Grand Prix", which will determine which is the fastest car in the world. But the road to the championship is filled with potholes, detours and hilarious surprises when Mate is caught in a mysterious international spy adventure.

Faced with the dilemma of helping to "Lightning" McQueen or acting career in the mission of ultra-secret spy, Mate's journey, full of action, leading to an explosive chase through the streets of Japan and other countries Europe, accompanied by his friends and seen by the world. Moreover, this rapid diversion adds a colorful cast of new cars, among which include secret agents, menacing villains and international racing competitors remarkable.

Production notes:
John Lasseter returns to the driver's seat to manage the continuation of Cars, the film won the Golden Globe Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® Award 2006, which was co-directed by Brad Lewis, producer of Ratatouille, film awarded an Oscar Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® - and produced by veteran visual effects industry Denise Ream - Up and associate producer on Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith.

Cars 2 is the twelfth animated feature from Pixar Animation Studios (the first eleven have earned 441,000 million at the box office worldwide). Pixar, winner of 29 Academy Awards Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® and seven Golden Globes Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â®, celebrating its twentieth anniversary this year.
